TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 显示消息窗口（也称为对话框）向用户展示消息。

span.span: Displays a message window, also known as a dialog box, which presents a message to the user.

summary.span: 这是一个模式窗口，可阻止应用程序中的其他操作，直到用户将其关闭。

span.span: It is a modal window, blocking other actions in the application until the user closes it.

summary.span: 可包含通知并指示用户的文本、按钮和符号。

span.span: A can contain text, buttons, and symbols that inform and instruct the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能创建 类的新实例。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要显示消息框，请 调用 `static` 方法。To display a message box, call the `static` method . 消息框中显示的标题、消息、按钮和图标由传递给此方法的参数决定。The title, message, buttons, and icons displayed in the message box are determined by parameters that you pass to this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 向用户通知 中缺少的条目。The following code example shows how to use a to inform the user of a missing entry in a . 此示例需要从现有窗体中调用方法，该窗体上有一个名为**ServerName**的 。This example requires that the method is called from an existing form with a named **ServerName** on it. [!code-cpp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何向用户询问 "是" 或 "否" 问题，并根据响应做出决定。The following code example shows how to ask the user a yes or no question and make a decision based on the response. [!code-cpp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 `owner` 参数指定实现 接口的特定对象，该对象将用作对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 默认情况下，消息框显示 **"确定"** 按钮。By default, the message box displays an **OK** button. 消息框的标题中不包含标题。The message box does not contain a caption in the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `helpFilePath` 参数中指定的帮助文件。When the user clicks Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened. 拥有消息框的窗体（或活动窗体）还会接收 事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. `helpFilePath` 参数的格式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示包含 "帮助" 按钮的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened. 该示例要求安装 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以使用 `owner` 参数指定实现 接口的特定对象，该对象将用作对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `helpFilePath` 参数中指定的帮助文件。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened. 拥有消息框的窗体（或活动窗体）还会接收 事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. `helpFilePath` 参数的格式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示以主窗体为父级的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box that parented to the main form. 消息框显示 "帮助" 按钮。The message box displays a Help button. 用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened. 该示例要求安装 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `helpFilePath` 参数中指定的帮助文件，并显示由 `navigator` 参数标识的帮助内容。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框的窗体（或活动窗体）还会接收 事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的目录、索引、搜索和关键字链接。Compiled help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以将以下值用于 `navigator`： 、、或 。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . 您可以使用 `param` 对 命令提供进一步的优化。You can use `param` to provide further refinement of the command. 如果 `navigator` 参数中指定的值是 、或 ，则应 `null`该值。If the value specified in the `navigator` parameter is , , or , this value should be `null`. 如果 `navigator` 参数引用 ，则此值应引用包含要显示的主题的数值的对象。If the `navigator` parameter references , this value should reference an object that contains the numeric value of the topic to display. `helpFilePath` 参数的格式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示包含 "帮助" 按钮的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件，并显示 "帮助索引" 选项卡和由 `ovals` 关键字标识的主题。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab and the topic identified by the `ovals` keyword are displayed. 该示例要求安装 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以使用 `owner` 参数指定实现 接口的特定对象，该对象将用作对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `helpFilePath` 参数中指定的帮助文件，并显示由 `navigator` 参数标识的帮助内容。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框的窗体（或活动窗体）还会接收 事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的目录、索引、搜索和关键字链接。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以将以下值用于 `navigator`： 、、或 。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . `helpFilePath` 参数的格式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主窗口中显示一个具有父级的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box parented to the main window. 消息框显示 "帮助" 按钮。The message box displays a Help button. 用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件，并显示 "帮助索引" 选项卡。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab is displayed. 该示例要求安装 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是模式对话框，这意味着除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 在输入到另一种形式之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 您可以使用 `owner` 参数指定实现 接口的特定对象，该对象将用作对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `helpFilePath` 参数中指定的帮助文件，并显示由 `navigator` 参数标识的帮助内容。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框的窗体（或活动窗体）还会接收 事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的目录、索引、搜索和关键字链接。Compiled help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以将以下值用于 `navigator`： 、、或 。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . 您可以使用 `param` 对 命令提供进一步的优化。You can use `param` to provide further refinement of the command. 如果 `navigator` 参数中指定的值是 、或 ，则应 `null`该值。If the value specified in the `navigator` parameter is , , or , this value should be `null`. 如果 `navigator` 参数引用 ，则此值应引用包含要显示的主题的数值的对象。If the `navigator` parameter references , this value should reference an object that contains the numeric value of the topic to display. `helpFilePath` 参数的格式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或/folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主窗口中显示一个具有父级的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box parented to the main window. 消息框显示 "帮助" 按钮。The message box displays a Help button. 当用户单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将打开 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件，并显示 "帮助索引" 选项卡和由 `ovals` 关键字标识的主题。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab and the topic identified by the `ovals` keyword are displayed. 该示例要求安装 `Mspaint.chm` 帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed.
